features: 7-ounce canister of Aveeno Positively Smooth Moisturizing Shave Gel to help naturally minimize the appearance of unwanted hair with continued use
Formula contains soy, aloe, conditioners, and Vitamin E to condition hair, making it easier to get a close, smooth shave
Moisturizing shave gel helps you shave less often with continued use, while helping to prevent nicks, cuts, and razor bumps
Shave gel is gentle enough for sensitive skin and helps to protect against shaving irritation
The creamy shave gel is from Aveeno, a dermatologist recommended brand. It rinses clean and has a light, natural scent
body.description: Aveeno Positively Smooth Moisturizing Shave Gel will help naturally minimize the appearance of unwanted hair with continued use. Gentle enough for sensitive skin, this formula contains soy, aloe, Vitamin E and conditioners helps you shave less often with continued use and helps prevent nicks, cuts, and razor bumps. The moisturizing ingredients and vitamins help soften and condition hair, making it easier to get a close, smooth shave while helping prevent shaving irritation. This creamy shave gel rinses clean and has a light, natural scent.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Helps prevent, nicks, cuts and razor bumps AVEENO Positively Smooth Shave Gel, 7 FL. OZ. This creamy shaving gel is uniquely formulated with natural soy and rich emollients to help immediately soften and condition hair, making it easier for you to get a closer shave and to shave less often with continued use. The clean-rinsing formula helps prevent nicks, cuts and even razor burn by helping to hydrate and moisturize skin. It's even gentle enough to use on sensitive skin.

Active Naturals Total Soy Complex Traditional Chinese medicine has used soy for thousands of years to reduce the appearance of blotchy skin and discoloration. AVEENO Brand scientists devised a way to process soybeans that retains the integrity of the proteins to provide immediate and long-term skin benefits. Products with our Active Naturals Total Soy Complex visibly help transform dull, uneven skin into brighter, more radiant skin.

About AVEENO Brand From humble beginnings in 1945, the story of the AVEENO Brand has been one of discovery. By unlocking nature’s powers through scientific advances, they have discovered ways to nurture and transform skin and hair to an enhanced state of natural health and beauty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for wet shaving with Panasonic Wet/Dry shavers. Smells fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this gel for years and it is my “go to” for shaving both my head and face. For my head, I use an OmniShaver, and for my face, a Panasonic Arc5 shaver. A small amount mixed with water and applied to the skin creates a slick, lubricating surface that promotes shaver glide. The ingredients in the gel - soy, aloe, conditioners, and Vitamin E – soften the hair, promote swelling of the hair that facilitates capture by the shaver foil, and eliminates ingrown hairs, razor bumps and razor burn. The gel smells wonderful – almost like an oatmeal cookie – and the ingredients are actually good for the skin and leave the skin feeling moisturized with a smooth, glowing, healthy appearance. Target stores in the United States make a generic version of this gel called Up & Up Smoothing Shave Gel Soy, which is a little cheaper than the Aveeno version but is equally effective and smells equally fantastic. I can’t recommend this gel highly enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Shave Gel
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I both exclusively use this shave gel and have for many years. It is hard to find locally, and buying in bulk on Amazon solves that problem at a great price. The scent is light and the moisturizing is great! It is perfect for all areas of the body, and a little goes a long way!

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good shaving cream

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more razor bumps
reviews.reviewText: My dermatologist recommended that I switch to Aveeno shave gel from my previous shaving foam.With the shaving foam (and a triple-blade shaver), I frequently had "razor bumps", where cut hairs fold back into the skin and cause irritation and bumps to form.With Aveeno and a double-blade protective razor, the razor bumps are virtually eliminated. When I do get one, it is minor - unlike the ones I got before.The Aveeno gel protects the skin and seems to really help avoid the razor bumps.Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great shaving product
reviews.reviewText: Great price on a 6 can set. However, 1 of the 6 cans was not full. Upon shaking the can, it felt like it was only about 1/4 full.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells amazing, seems to stay smooth longer
reviews.reviewText: Title says it all. Stuff really does smell delightful and whether its the moisturizing effect or the phytoestrogen in the soy reducing hair growth, you do seem to stay smooth for longer
